headline: ðŸ’¥ POP/STARS Storms Past Warriors in Round 1
excerpt: The #1 seed K/DA anthem dominates in a statement performance, winning by 89 votes against the 2014 Worlds classic.
author: Anthem Arena
content: **POP/STARS** has advanced to Round 2 after a convincing 58%-42% victory over **Warriors**. The virtual group phenomenon never let the Imagine Dragons classic into the match, winning by 89 votes in a statement performance...

headline: Round 1 Recap: 5 Upsets, 7 Thrillers, and 12,547 Votes Cast
subheadline: The tournament's opening round delivered non-stop drama
excerpt: Round 1 is in the books with 32 matches decided. From nail-biting finishes to shocking upsets, here are the biggest storylines.
author: Anthem Arena

headline: Semifinals Preview: The Final Four is Set
subheadline: Four songs remain. Who will advance to the championship?
excerpt: After three brutal rounds, only four songs remain standing. Here's what you need to know before voting opens.
author: Anthem Arena
